Reviews.Title: “Just okay...”
Reviews.Author: NAUgrad2005
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights travel package hotel fine pros easy grande gra ring highway theres bus stop outside gates hotel connects metro line access downtown rome free parking decent breakfast sometimes restocked cons east 30 minutes termini metro stop wifi access 1 euro hour strong signal beds ridiculously hard sheets changed entire stay shower mold bottom edge hot ability adjust prepared roast desk staff friendly spoke english helpful directions breakfast decent cereals yogurt meat juices times milk cereal temperature juice frequently okay hotel suited fairly hotel definitely stand upgrade mattresses pillows sleeping box springs

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: any-nadine
Reviews.Content: 3 days city break spent rome alba hotel nice money paid true thats little bit city center 50 hotel bus station bus 1 stop bus 20 511 3 stops stop anagnina direct metro line till vaticano termini complicated location quiet clean bathrooms towels changed safe box lcd tvnot real thin walls provide bad isolation breakfast tipical italian cheese ham panini cakes cereals milk tea coffee start day experience recommend peole visiting rome enjoy

Reviews.Title: “very good for this price”
Reviews.Author: mariana m
Reviews.Content: clean nice hotel enjoy 5 nights visite rome supose distance bus station direct termini station bus minute 5 minute walk free wifi acces lobby price

Reviews.Title: “Do not stay at this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: saunierman
Reviews.Content: arrived friday 16th sept promptly checked 17th danger zone sockets hanging walls lights etc gas electrical engineer britain issued notice shut breakfast total insult informing gardener janitor receptionist leaving informed despite paying 4 nights staying pay city tax 4 nights refused threatened police gladly welcomed changed mind told professional leaving couple checking told spent nights booked week couldnt suffer maintained dignity times english unlike fronted desk hotel miles remain booked radisson blu rome welcome

Reviews.Title: “nice but lots of problems”
Reviews.Author: hellodubrovnik
Reviews.Content: nice hotel lot comparing average rome hotels nice shower shampoo air conditioning housekeeping bad 5 nights bed sheets werent changed real loud sound tv talking phone ears couldnt sleep reception warn night literally sleep frustrated hotel hotel center bus metro station 13 stops termini termini center vatican leave hotel 15 hours prior time am sorry hotel

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value, fantastic links to the city”
Reviews.Author: MegG360
Reviews.Content: arriving hotel friend little unsure due location passing security gate entering hotels reception pleasantly surprised check process fairly quick simple staff polite helpful luggage lift floor immediately blown size cramped parisian hotel week found space luxury equipped exactly described wifi 2 euros hour remember rightly prices drinks mini bar reasonable breakfast basic continental style bread cheeses yoghurt cereals coffee plentiful supply occasion hear noise guests morning otherwise hotel quiet kept clean bedding changed day location getting city road sells tickets 1 euro bus stop outside hotel bus goes urban stops metro station main line runs termini sights colosseum vatican city getting bus metro station getting metro city takes hour bit people sightseeing budget value money goes alba hotel takes cake tiny budget perfectly definitely return despite short commute

Reviews.Title: “Great Value for a Trip to Rome but be Prepared for Commute”
Reviews.Author: CityBreakCouple_9
Reviews.Content: partner business hotel eastern city read terrible reviews hotels bit dodgy honest ones alba hotel werent bad hotel value money offers reception breakfast staff friendly factors distinctly average kept clean prepared daily commute city 5 minutes bus arrives outside hotel maybe 25 minutes metro value money factor staying expensive roma
